nodes.text: The Eastern Fleet was one of three fleets of equal strength that comprised the naval force of alien warlord Nuso Esva during the Galactic Civil War. The Eastern Fleet was smashed by Imperial forces during a battle in the Poln system eight months after the Battle of Yavin.
The Easter Fleet was composed of 28 Firekiln-class heavy cruisers, almost 100 escort ships, and 50 Whisperlike-class fighters.
